ashes-and-dust.name: Firestarter
ashes-and-dust.desc: Increases Long Range by 15, Long Range damage by 15%, Affinity damage from Thunderous Applause, Touch of Frost, Infernal Boom, Stormcaller, and Barrage skills by 15%

ashes-and-dust.name: Grit
ashes-and-dust.desc:
Enabled through the usage of 13 Shots to Hell & Ashes and Dust skills not including Desperado and Curtain Call.
Long Range damage increased by +5%
A stack of Grit grants +1 Rapid skill stack, +1% Rapid Boost, and +150 LB Cap for 13 Shots to Hell
Stacks up to 10 times then converts into Full Grit
Full Grit is removed after 20 seconds.
Using 13 Shots to Hell & Ashes and Dust skills refreshes the buff and adds 1 counter.

ashes-and-dust.name: Rolling Guard
ashes-and-dust.desc:
Dashes towards a target granting Tetrakarn, Makarakarn, Super Armor, and 5 stacks of Grit. 
 Restores HP by 75% of damage dealt.

ashes-and-dust.name: Desperado
ashes-and-dust.desc: The use of this skill consumed all stacks of Grit and Full Grit while granting High Noon for a fixed 20 seconds.

ashes-and-dust.name: Curtain Call
ashes-and-dust.desc: The use of this skill consumed all stacks of Grit and Full Grit while granting High Noon for a fixed 20 seconds.

berserker.name: Einheri
berserker.desc:
Gain Warrior Stance for 50 seconds and learns skill Ragnarok
 Gain a stack of Aldar Rok for each consecutive attack Single Target Berserker skills and Gatling Strike used, stacking up to 5.
 Gain skill Ragnarok

berserker.name: Eftirlifandi
berserker.desc:
Gain Defensive Stance for 30 minutes.
 Gain a stack of Eldfjalla Brynja for each consecutive attack Single Target Berserker skills and Gatling Strike used, stacking up to 5.
 The effects of Attacking Stance overwrites Defensive Stance

berserker.name: Kedjubrjotur
berserker.desc:
Gain Attacking Stance for 30 minutes.
 Gain a stack of Yfirthirmandi for each consecutive attack Single Target Berserker skills and Gatling Strike used, stacking up to 5.
 The effects of Defensive Stance overwrites Attacking Stance

conditions-magic.name: Critical Up Improvement 1
conditions-magic.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Magic Combat that increases critical in accordance to level (Critical + Level x 0.5).

conditions-magic.name: Magic Up Improvement 1
conditions-magic.desc: Passive skill that increases Magic in accordance to level(Magic + Level x 0.15).

conditions-magic.name: Critical Up Improvement 2
conditions-magic.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Magic Combat that increases critical in accordance to level (Critical + Level x 0.5).

conditions-magic.name: Limit Break Chance Up Improvement 1
conditions-magic.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Magic Combat that increases limit break chance in accordance to level (Limit Break Chance + Level x 0.05).

conditions-melee.name: Critical Up Improvement 1
conditions-melee.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Melee Combat that increases critical in accordance to level (Critical + Level x 0.5).

conditions-melee.name: Strength Up Improvement 1
conditions-melee.desc: Passive skill that increases Power in accordance to level(Power + Level x 0.15).

conditions-melee.name: Critical Up Improvement 2
conditions-melee.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Melee Combat that increases critical in accordance to level (Critical + Level x 0.5).

conditions-melee.name: Limit Break Chance Up Improvement 1
conditions-melee.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Melee Combat that increases limit break chance in accordance to level (Limit Break Chance + Level x 0.05).

conditions-ranged.name: Critical Up Improvement 1
conditions-ranged.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Ranged Combat that increases critical in accordance to level (Critical + Level x 0.5).

conditions-ranged.name: Speed Up Improvement 1
conditions-ranged.desc: Passive skill that increases speed in accordance to level(Speed + Level x 0.15).

conditions-ranged.name: Critical Up Improvement 2
conditions-ranged.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Ranged Combat that increases critical in accordance to level (Critical + Level x 0.5).

conditions-ranged.name: Limit Break Chance Up Improvement 1
conditions-ranged.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Ranged Combat that increases limit break chance in accordance to level (Limit Break Chance + Level x 0.05).

craftsmanship.name: Manus Up
craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that will allow you to withdraw the effects of a Manus Item during cultivation.

craftsmanship.name: Slot Chance
craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that increases the chance of having additional Modification Slot during cultivation.

craftsmanship.name: Manus Up
craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that will allow you to withdraw the effects of a Manus Item during cultivation.

craftsmanship.name: Slot Chance
craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that increases the chance of having additional Modification Slot during cultivation.

craftsmanship.name: Manus Up
craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that will allow you to withdraw the effects of a Manus Item during cultivation.

craftsmanship.name: Slot Chance
craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that increases the chance of having additional Modification Slot during cultivation.

craftsmanship.name: Manus Up
craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that will allow you to withdraw the effects of a Manus Item during cultivation.

craftsmanship.name: Slot Chance
craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that increases the chance of having additional Modification Slot during cultivation.

craftsmanship.name: Manus Up
craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that will allow you to withdraw the effects of a Manus Item during cultivation.

craftsmanship.name: Slot Chance
craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that increases the chance of having additional Modification Slot during cultivation.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Erosion Hex
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that eats at the body and soul of surrounding enemies, and has a low probability of inflicting various adverse effects.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Delay Hex Yang
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that interferes with the target's timing. Increases enemy's incantation time by 50%.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Slash Hex
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that eats at the target's spirit and mind. Increases the target's susceptibility to Close-range attacks by 100%. Effect lasts until knockback of target, or for 30 seconds.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Bullet Hex
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that eats at the target's spirit and mind. Increases the target's susceptibility to Long-range attacks by 100%. Effect lasts until knockback of target, or for 30 seconds.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Spell Hex
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that eats at the target's spirit and mind. Increases the target's susceptibility to Magic attacks by 100%. Effect lasts until knockback of target, or for 30 seconds.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Curse of the Slow Cure
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that slows down the recovery of its victim by eating away at the victim's body. Reduces the target's Curative Resistance by 100%. Effect lasts for 30 seconds.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Delay Hex Yin
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that interferes with the target's timing. Increases skill cooldown time by 50%.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Damage Hex
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A sinister curse, that causes the target to receive attacks in succession (grants Null knockback). Effect lasts for 15 seconds.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Curse of the Broken Mirror
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: Spreads a curse over a wide area that nullifies Tetrakarn and Makarakarn.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Lord of Malevolence
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: Nerve, Mind, Death Damage +25%. Fire, Ice, Elec, Force Damage -20%

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Seductive Hex
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: What if Erosion Hex could also cast charm

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Corrosion Hex
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that eats at the body and soul of surrounding enemies, and has a low probability of inflicting various adverse effects.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Curse of the Four Wounds
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that reduces elemental resistances of surrounding enemies by 30%. (Fire, Ice, Electric, Force)

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Whistler
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: Heals 30% HP and MP of damage dealt. Applies Debuff that prevents Null to expel and death. Applies Debuff that reduces Nerve, Mind, Mystic, Expel, and Death resistance by 20%

enhancement.name: Divine Heal
enhancement.desc: Through the grace of a High Spirit, all party members in the area are healed, and HP regeneration rate raised for 5 minutes.

enhancement.name: Pulse of Assult
enhancement.desc: The pulsating heart of aggression exalts the party members. The user and party members in the area have their damage increased for 30 seconds. (XX% boost dependent on Intelligence level)

enhancement.name: Pulse of Solid
enhancement.desc: The pulsating heart of resistance exalts the party members. The user and party members in the area have their defense increased for 30 seconds. (XX% boost dependent on Intelligence level)

enhancement.name: Pulse of Armored
enhancement.desc: Gives one member in the party a valiant heart that knows no surrender. Temporarily cancels knockback from received attacks for 30 seconds.

enhancement.name: Clock Cut
enhancement.desc: Blessing that raises the mind of one targeted party member. The target who receives this support spell will have a reduced incantation time, HP Cost, and MP Cost of 50% for one skill.

enhancement.name: Divine Blessing
enhancement.desc: Through the grace of a High Spirit, all party members in the area are healed, and HP regeneration rate raised for 5 minutes. (Higher healing modifier than Divine Heal)

enhancement.name: Clock Off
enhancement.desc: Blessing that raises the mind of one targeted party member. The target who receives this support spell will have a reduced incantation time of 100%, and no HP or MP Cost for one skill.

enhancement.name: Divine Shield
enhancement.desc: Through the protection of a High Spirit, all party members in the area will repel physical attacks up to twice. Shield lasts for 5 minutes.

enhancement.name: Divine Barrier
enhancement.desc: Through the protection of a High Spirit, all party members in the area will repel magical attacks up to twice. Shield lasts for 5 minutes.

enhancement.name: Divine Grace
enhancement.desc: Through the grace of a High Spirit, all party members in the area are healed, and have all of their status ailments cured. (Higher healing modifier than Divine Blessing)

enhancement.name: Fleetfoot
enhancement.desc: Grants +50% Movement Speed for 10 minutes to nearby party members. Doesn't overwrite other movement speed buffs.

enhancement.name: Inspiring Presence
enhancement.desc: All Party members' General Damage +10%, +LB Cap * Support * 2

enhancement.name: Impulse of Armored
enhancement.desc: Gives all surrounding party members a valiant heart that knows no surrender. Temporarily cancels knockback from received attacks for 30 seconds. LB Power +15%, TA Power +15%.

enhancement.name: Encouragement of a Hero
enhancement.desc: +2 Skill Stack to all nearby Party members for 30 seconds.

enhancement.name: Doping
enhancement.desc: Increase the target's MAX HP by 10 for every 5 SUPPORT of the caster (up to 1000 HP)

essence-magic.name: Dyne Accel
essence-magic.desc: Grant extra skill stack to Agidyne, Bufudyne, Ziodyne and Zandyne for 1.5 times the MP Cost of a normal cast

essence-magic.name: Limit Break Chance Up Improvement 1
essence-magic.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Magic Combat that increases limit break chance in accordance to level (Limit Break Chance + Level x 0.05).

essence-magic.name: Ma-Dyne Accel
essence-magic.desc: Grant extra skill stack to Maragidyne, Mabufudyne, Maziodyne and Mazandyne for 1.5 times the MP Cost of a normal spell cast.

essence-magic.name: Megi Accel
essence-magic.desc: Grant extra skill stack to Megido, Megidora and Megidoraon for 1.5 times the MP Cost of a normal spell cast.

essence-magic.name: Destructive Momentum
essence-magic.desc: When using Destruction Magic skill above Class 5, gains a stack of Momentum for 10 seconds that boosts Affinity Damage, LB Power, and LB Cap of the spells of its affinity. 5 Stacks Max.

essence-magic.name: Concentrate
essence-magic.desc: Grants the user Concentrated for 15 seconds, and Mage Aura for 30 seconds.

magic-bullet.name: Squall Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Atavaka mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Force-based and inflicts Stun effect at low success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Toxic Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Mamayuri mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Magic-based and inflicts Poison effect at low success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Forgetful Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Mamayuri mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Magic-based and inflicts Amnesia effect at low success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Arm Snipe
magic-bullet.desc: Through precise aim, snipe your foe's source of power. The enemy's Slash, Thrust and Blunt-based attacks are weakened.

magic-bullet.name: Enchanting Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Ragaraja mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Mind-based and inflicts Charm effect at low success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Spell Mute Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Mamayuri mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Magic-based and inflicts Mute effect at low success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Scorching Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Ucchusama mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Fire-based and inflicts Burn effect at high success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Hailing Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Yamantaka mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Ice-based and inflicts Freeze effect at a high success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Thundering Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Vajrayaksa mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Electric-based and inflicts Shock effect at low success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Blinding Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Kundali mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Nerve-based and inflicts Blind effect at high success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Black Huntsman
magic-bullet.desc: Increases LB cap of Magic Bullet skills by (Spell + LNGR)

magic-bullet.name: Grand Finale
magic-bullet.desc: Next skill used gain Momentum - effect ends once a different skill is used or the buff expires

magic-fist.name: Kamaitachi
magic-fist.desc: Surrounds yourself with a vacuum, slicing enemies you pass to bits. Inflicts Force-based damage on all enemies in range.

magic-fist.name: Freezing Lance
magic-fist.desc: Clads yourself in cold, and freezes enemies' blood with a thrust. Inflicts Ice-based damage on all enemies in range.

magic-fist.name: Sonic Through
magic-fist.desc: Creates an electric field and electrocutes your foes. Inflicts Electric-based damage on all enemies in range.

magic-fist.name: Delorean
magic-fist.desc: A trail of fire from your feet burns all enemies in your path. Inflicts Fire-based damage on all enemies in range.

magic-fist.name: Magical Combat Mastery
magic-fist.desc: Increases damage dealt by the four elements (Fire, Ice, Electric, Force) by 10%

magic-fist.name: Spell Runner
magic-fist.desc: Inflicts Mystic-based damage and Mute ailment on all enemies in range.

magic-fist.name: Devil Heart Breaker
magic-fist.desc: A deadly feat of magic that penetrates even a Demon's heart. Inflicts Almighty-based damage on all enemies in range.

magic-fist.name: Enchanted Slicer
magic-fist.desc: For Magic Fist skills: Increase LB Cap by (Spell +CLS-R)

magic-fist.name: Four-Winged Crusader
magic-fist.desc: Grants the user Zephyr for 25 seconds, and Spellblade Stance for 25 seconds with 70 seconds Cooldown

three-forms.name: Lord of Armor
three-forms.desc: Null Knockback, Null Incapacitate (damage does not interrupt incantation). Decreases General-Damage dealt by 100%. Decreases damage received by 50%.

three-forms.name: Master of Swords
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Magic Defense, increase ones Strength (Strength +25, Magic Defense -15).

three-forms.name: Master of Guns
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Magic Defense, increase ones Speed (Speed + 25, Magic Defense - 15).

three-forms.name: Master of Magic
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Physical Defense, increase ones Magic (Magic +25, Physical Defense -15).

three-forms.name: Master of Summons
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Physical Defense, increase the ability of Partners (Demon STR, SPD, & MAG +10, Physical Defense -15).

three-forms.name: Master of the Blade
three-forms.desc: Passive Skill that increases Melee Attack Power (Close Range +5).

three-forms.name: Master of the Bullet
three-forms.desc: Passive Skill that increases Long Range Attack Power (Long Range +5).

three-forms.name: Master of Spells
three-forms.desc: Passive Skill that increases Spell Power (Spell +5).

three-forms.name: Master of Servants
three-forms.desc: Passive Skill that increases the ability of Partners (CLS-R, LNG-R, Spell & Support +2).

three-forms.name: Blade of God
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Physical Defense, increase ones Strength (Strength +40, Physical Defense -15).

three-forms.name: Shots from the Depths
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Physical Defense, increase ones Speed (Speed +40, Physical Defense -15).

three-forms.name: Lost Grimoire
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Magical Defense, increase ones Magic (Magic +40, Magical Defense -15).

three-forms.name: Call of the Abyss
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Magical Defense, increase the ability of Partners (Demon STR, SPD, & MAG +15, Magical Defense -15).

mitama.name: Mitama Demon Sympathy 1
mitama.desc: Passive skill that increases the experience acquisition of your summoned sacred soul Devil (+5% experience acquisition to Mitama Demon).

mitama.name: Mitama Demon Encouragement 1
mitama.desc: -10% CLS-R damage taken by Mitama Demon

mitama.name: Mitama Demon Sympathy 2
mitama.desc: Passive skill that increases the experience acquisition of your summoned sacred soul Devil (+10% experience acquisition to Mitama Demon).

mitama.name: Mitama Demon Encouragement 2
mitama.desc: -10% LNG-R damage taken by Mitama Demon

mitama.name: Mitama Demon Sympathy 3
mitama.desc: Passive skill that increases the experience acquisition of your summoned sacred soul Devil (+15% experience acquisition to Mitama Demon).

mitama.name: Mitama Demon Encouragement 3
mitama.desc: -10% Spell damage taken by Mitama Demon

mitama.name: Mitama Demon Command - Offense
mitama.desc: STR, MAG, SPD +20 to Mitama Demon

mitama.name: Mitama Demon Command - Defense
mitama.desc: VIT, INT, LCK +20 to Mitama Demon

mitama.name: Mitama Demon Enhancement - Iron Man
mitama.desc: Testimony to your Mitamas' enhancement. Ability granted by Mitama Fusion is increased.

mitama.name: Mitama Demon Overgrowth
mitama.desc: Increases Limit Break Cap by 1000 for your summoned Mitama Demon.

rampage.name: Close-Quarters Combat
rampage.desc: Increases Limit Break Cap by CLS-R * 2. Additionally increases Limit Break Cap by 500 and Limit Break Power by 5% for Rush skills and Hasso-Happa

rampage.name: Wake of Morningstar
rampage.desc: Upon use of skill, Gains the buff [At World's End]. This buff increases Spin Damage by 15%, Limit Break Cap by 2000, Limit Break Chance and Power by 10% for all Spin skills and Hasso-Happa

rampage.name: Massacre
rampage.desc: Upon use of skill, Gains the buff [Havoc]. This buff increases Rush Damage by 20%, Limit Break Cap by 3000, Limit Break Chance and Power by 10% for all Rush skills

regal-presence.name: Lord of Serfs
regal-presence.desc: Reduces demon's LNG-R, ClS-R, and Spell by 5. Increases Cls-R by 10 and Critical by 40

regal-presence.name: Lord of Soldiers
regal-presence.desc: Increases Spin damage by 10%, Increases Critical by 40

regal-presence.name: Lord of Martyrs
regal-presence.desc: Increases Attack damage by 10%, Increases Critical by 40

regal-presence.name: Lord of Stampede
regal-presence.desc: Increases Rush damage by 10%, Increases Critical by 40

regal-presence.name: Critical Up Improvement 1
regal-presence.desc: Increases critical in accordance to level (Critical + Level x 0.5).

regal-presence.name: Lord of the Blood Axe
regal-presence.desc: Increases Attack damage by 20%. Reduces Healing receivedd by 40%. HP cost reduced by 20% for Attack skills

regal-presence.name: Lord of Knights
regal-presence.desc: Increases Critical Defense by 75 and enables you to survive lethal blows with 5% chance. (Clench)

regal-presence.name: Lord of the Beasts
regal-presence.desc: Increases Rush damage by 30%, Increases damage received by 15%

regal-presence.name: Strength Up Improvement 1
regal-presence.desc: Increases Strength in accordance to level(Strength + Level x 0.15).

regal-presence.name: Lord of Fighters
regal-presence.desc: Increases Spin damage by 30%. Increases damage received by 15%. HP cost reduced by 30% for Spin skills

regal-presence.name: Lord of Courage
regal-presence.desc: Increases Close Range damage by 15% when HP is lower than 50%. Increases Close Range damage by 25% when HP is lower than 25%

regal-presence.name: Lord of Victory
regal-presence.desc: Increases all Melee damage dealt by 15%. Increases Final Crit by 5%. Reduces Healing received by 25%.

regal-presence.name: Critical Up Improvement 2
regal-presence.desc: Increases critical in accordance to level (Critical + Level x 0.5).

regal-presence.name: Excalibur
regal-presence.desc: Increases Close Range by 30 and Limit Break Cap by CLS-R*2.

regal-presence.name: Lord of Immortality
regal-presence.desc: Increases Critical Defense by 150, Enables you to survive lethal blows with 10% chance, Increases MAX HP by 500

sanguine-contract.name: Haste
sanguine-contract.desc: Demon Incantation and Cooldown reduced by 10%

sanguine-contract.name: Emergency Shield
sanguine-contract.desc: Automatically casts Tetrakarn on your Demon when summoned

sanguine-contract.name: Emergency Barrier
sanguine-contract.desc: Automatically casts Makarakarn on your Demon when summoned

sanguine-contract.name: Call of the Crown
sanguine-contract.desc: Automatically applies Super Armor to your Demon when summoned

sanguine-contract.name: Unfair Exchange
sanguine-contract.desc: Summoner damage dealt -20%, Demon damage dealt +15%

sanguine-contract.name: Seal of Command - Knight
sanguine-contract.desc: Summoner CLS-R damage taken +10%, Demon CLS-R damage taken -25%

sanguine-contract.name: Seal of Command - Archer
sanguine-contract.desc: Summoner LNG-R damage taken +10%, Demon LNG-R damage taken -25%

sanguine-contract.name: Seal of Command - Magician
sanguine-contract.desc: Summoner Spell damage taken +10%, Demon Spell damage taken -25%

sanguine-contract.name: Wickedness
sanguine-contract.desc: Automatically casts a buff on your Demon when summoned, lasting for 8 minutes granting Technical Attack chance +5% and Technical Attack power +5

sanguine-contract.name: Cracked Chains
sanguine-contract.desc: Demon damage taken -10% / -25% Demon damage taken while Digitalized

sanguine-contract.name: Bloody Handshake
sanguine-contract.desc:
If Open Hearts With your summoned partner, their Final Crit Correction is increased by +10%
 If Bonded, their Limit Break Cap is increased by +500

sanguine-contract.name: Order of the Absolute - Strength
sanguine-contract.desc:
Use of this skill grants Demon Smile - Strength for 20 seconds as-well as Demon Smile Penalty for 50 seconds
 Demon Smile grants an increase in Partner's damage by +25%, Limit Break Cap to partner by +500, and when digitized another +750 Limit Break Cap increase is given. Additonally grants Limit Break Cap by Partner's Close-Range.

sanguine-contract.name: Order of the Absolute - Magic
sanguine-contract.desc:
Use of this skill grants Demon Smile - Magic for 20 seconds as-well as Demon Smile Penalty 50 seconds
 Demon Smile grants an increase in Partner's damage by +25%, Limit Break Cap to partner by +500, and when digitized another +750 Limit Break Cap increase is given. Additonally grants Limit Break Cap by Partner's Spell.

sanguine-contract.name: Order of the Absolute - Speed
sanguine-contract.desc:
Use of this skill grants Demon Smile - Speed for 20 seconds as-well as Demon Smile Penalty 50 seconds
 Demon Smile grants an increase in Partner's damage by +25%, Limit Break Cap to partner by +500, and when digitized another +750 Limit Break Cap increase is given. Additonally grants Limit Break Cap by Partner's Long-Range.

sanguine-contract.name: Order of the Absolute - Support
sanguine-contract.desc:
Use of this skill grants Demon Smile - Support for 20 seconds as-well as Demon Smile Penalty 50 seconds
 Demon Smile grants an increase in Partner's damage by +25%, Limit Break Cap to partner by +500, and when digitized another +750 Limit Break Cap increase is given. Additonally grants Limit Break Cap by Partner's Support.

support-bullet.name: Elemental Tuner
support-bullet.desc: Increase Fire, Ice, Electric, Force damage by 3%. Can be applied 100 times, but disappears 30s after the first shot.

support-bullet.name: Healing Tuner
support-bullet.desc: Increase HP and MP Regen by 1%. Can be applied 100 times, but disappears 1m after the first shot.

support-bullet.name: Ability Tuner
support-bullet.desc: Str, Vit, Mag, Int, Spd, Lck by 2. Can be applied 100 times, but disappears 30s after the first shot.

support-bullet.name: Limit Tuner
support-bullet.desc: Limit break power and chance by 1%. Can be applied 100 times, but disappears 30s after the first shot.

support-bullet.name: Assault Tuner
support-bullet.desc: Increase General Damage by 2%. Can be applied 100 times, but disappears 30s after the first shot.

support-bullet.name: Critical Tuner
support-bullet.desc: Increase Final Crit Chance by 1%, 10 stack max. Can be applied 100 times, but disappears 1m after the first shot.

support-bullet.name: Intensive Break Tuner
support-bullet.desc: Increase LB Cap by 1000 (only applies one stack per shot). Can be applied 100 times, but disappears 20s after the first shot.

synthesis.name: Tarot Fusion
synthesis.desc: A secret art that fuses the power contained within Demon Crystals and Tarot Cards with equipment. When successful, the crystal or card is lost, but the equipment acquires special powers. When unsuccessful, the equipment's Durability decreases.

synthesis.name: Crystallize Demon
synthesis.desc: A secret art that fuses summoned demons with certain jewels to create Demon Crystals. When successful, the demon is lost, but a Demon Crystal is acquired in its stead. When unsuccessful, the jewel is lost and Friendship level with the demon drops.

synthesis.name: Soul Stone Fusion
synthesis.desc: With this secret art, you can fuse Demon Crystals and Soul Stones together with Equipment. When successful, both the crystal and stone is lost but a special power is added to the Equipment. When unsuccessful, the Equipment's durability is decreased and both the crystal and stone is lost.
